name: Jungle Running
description:
Title: Jungle Running

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

 Game Overview: Collect Trophies, and beat the game in a 90 second window.  

Instructions: Using WASD to move and your mouse to look run around a small world and try to beat the game within 90 seconds

Game Design Team – Jack Rahal
